conclusion: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions;Possessions);Respondent State to take measures of a general character (Article 46 - Pilot judgment;General measures);Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF MARIA ATANASIU AND OTHERS v. ROMANIA
judges: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall
representedby: POPESCU C.-L. ; POPESCU C.-R. ; NICULESCU-GORPIN R.-A. ; NICULESCU-GORPIN M.
